name: An Ocean of Potions
description:
A small game made during the month of October for Halloween. 

You use magical ingredients to brew all sorts of potions to help you summon spooky ghosts.  You use these ghosts in turn based combat - similar to pokemon double battles - and try to build the best team you can.  The enemies and the AI controlling them gets more difficult as you continue you win.  What level can you reach?

Lemme know which ghost is your favorite, I had a lot of fun designing them all and adding all their random descriptions.  

Enjoy.

[Optimized graphics and allowed for all aspect ratios 11/1]
